DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine whether COREG MR effective TOPROL-XL reduce microalbuminuria type 2 diabetic non-diabetic patient high blood pressure microalbuminuria .
DOC.brief_title: COREG MR Versus TOPROL-XL On Reduction Of Microalbuminuria In Patients With Hypertension And Microalbuminuria
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Documented history hypertension . Must take ACE ( angiotensin convert enzyme ) inhibitor either alone part antihypertensive regimen least 8 week . Persistent microalbuminuria . Exclusion criterion : History heart attack , stroke , congestive heart failure , arrhythmia , type 1 uncontrolled type 2 diabetes mellitus , liver renal disease . Has take nonocular betablockers indication within three month prior Prescreening .
